paper.title: Exploratory Continuous-Time Dual-Standard Mean-Variance Portfolio Selection: A Reinforcement Learning Method
paper.abstract: We investigate the feasibility problem of designing reinforcement learning (RL) algorithms for exploratory continuous-time dual-standard mean-variance (MV) portfolio selection problems. The problem is intended to provide theoretical support in the design of the corresponding RL algorithms. We give the corresponding policy improvement theorem (PIT) by which the policy can be improved for an initial policy. Then, we show that by appropriately selecting the initial policy and relying on the PIT, the algorithm can converge to the optimal policy after a finite number of iterations. Finally, we give a k-function that can be used for the design of RL algorithms for this problem.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心研究内容是使用强化学习算法解决连续时间双标准均值-方差投资组合选择问题，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。论文明确提到了投资组合选择问题，并讨论了如何通过强化学习方法来优化投资策略。
